improvements: Reduce highlights by -40 to -50 to attempt detail recovery in the overexposed fur on the top of the head
Apply a radial mask to the face area and increase exposure by +0.4 or shadows by +20 to brighten the features
Increase clarity by +15 to enhance the distinct texture of the fluffy coat
Warm the white balance slightly (Temperature +5) to remove the cool blue cast in the shadowed fur
Crop the bottom 15% of the image to position the subject's face closer to the optical center
critiques.notes: The image captures a wonderful expression and has great separation from the dark background, but the strong backlighting has caused the highlights to clip while leaving the face too dark. Balancing the dynamic range and warming the tones will make the portrait significantly more engaging.

improvements: Increase overall exposure by 15-20% to lift the shadows and reveal more detail in the white fur
Reduce the lens flare artifacts visible in the upper portion of the frame through spot healing or cloning
Crop tighter using rule of thirds composition, positioning the dog's eyes in the upper third for better engagement
Increase contrast by 10-15% to add definition between the white fur and darker background
Apply subtle sharpening to the eyes and nose area to enhance focal point clarity
critiques.notes: The image captures an engaging expression and has good subject isolation with the dark background, but suffers from underexposure causing loss of detail in the white fur and distracting lens flare. The composition is centered rather than following compositional guidelines, and the overall image lacks punch due to low contrast and soft focus.
